meanings.sent1: Please resubmit your homework if you want a better grade.
meanings.sent2: I had to resubmit my application because I forgot to sign it.
meanings.sent3: The teacher asked me to resubmit my essay, so I added more details this time.
meanings.sent4: I decided to resubmit my proposal with a new cover letter to make it more appealing.
meanings.sent5: After realizing my mistake, I quickly resubmitted the form before the deadline.

meanings.definition: To send something for consideration or approval again
meanings.sent1: She had to resubmit her project proposal for further review.
meanings.sent2: The company requested that I resubmit my resume with additional references.
meanings.sent3: I had to resubmit my travel itinerary because I forgot to include the return flight.
meanings.sent4: The artist decided to resubmit her painting to the gallery for another chance at acceptance.
meanings.sent5: In order to correct the error, I had to resubmit the document with the missing information.
